title: Accidental shooting sends juvenile to hospital
content:
Daily Journal
IUKA – A Tishomingo County boy is recovering from what appears to be an accidental gunshot wound.
The Tishomingo County Sheriff’s Department was called to the North Mississippi Medical Center–Iuka on Saturday about a person who had been shot. After talking with family members, deputies discovered that the juvenile male and a brother had been target shooting with a 9 mm pistol. When the victim attempted to disassemble the weapon, he accidentally shot himself in the abdomen.
The victim was transported Le Bonheur Children’s Hospital where he underwent surgery and was listed in critical condition.
The incident is being treated as an accidental shooting, and no charges are being filed at this time.
